Shard of the Winter Moon VH1 W 2W 3 Enchantment - Shard 1 Nonbasic lands enter the battlefield tapped. 2, Sacrifice Shard of the Winter Moon: Scry 1, then draw a card.
Void Trap VH1 W 1W 2 Enchantment Planeswalker 4 1 (Void Trap isn’t legendary) When Void Trap enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent until Void Trap leaves the battlefield. They discovered that the extracted spark’s connection to the Blind Eternities could be harnessed, creating a cage that defied all reason.
Ivory Armor VH1 W 1W 2 Artifact Enchantment - Aura Equipment 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has lifelink. As long as Ivory Armor isn’t attached to a creature, it doesn’t have “Enchant creature” and it isn’t an Aura. Equip 2
metal dragon VH1 W 4W 5 Artifact Creature - Drake 4/4 2 Flying Whenever metal dragon becomes tapped, scry 1, then gain 1 life.
